instruction: Read the article and extract all nouns. Output every noun, separated by comma.
input: The world has been facing rapid changes with digital transformation taking center stage. The use of technology is transforming how businesses are operating and this has led to new opportunities for organizations. With the rapid adoption of technologies, organizations have access to better data and more innovative ways of performing tasks with digital solutions.
output: world, changes, digital transformation, technology, businesses, opportunities, organizations, technology, adoption, technologies, data, ways, tasks, digital solutions.
